snippet: Prices of drugs used widely by older adults showed an increase of 26 percent from 2005 to 2009, according to a new report issued by AARP.
abstract: Prices of drugs used widely by older adults showed an increase of 26 percent from 2005 to 2009, according to a new report issued by AARP.

headline.main: Prices of Brand Name Drugs Rose Steeply, AARP Study Finds
